Explanations about Options.-c:
Create a new archive. Arguments supply the names of the files to be archived.
 Directories are archived recursively, unless the --no-recursion option is given.
Explanations about Options.-x:
Extract files from an archive. Arguments are optional. When given, they specify
 names of the archive members to be extracted.

Explanations about Options.--add-architecture:
Add architecture to the list of architectures for which packages can be installed
 without using --force-architecture (since dpkg 1.16.2). The architecture dpkg is
 built for (i.e. the output of --print-architecture) is always part of that list.
Explanations about Options.-i:
Install the package. If --recursive or -R option is specified, package-file must
 refer to a directory instead.
